text: Nɨbi binɨb okok kɨlop kanɨb adek ak yom tep gɨnɨgun apɨm ak pen, bɨ wɨdɨn koy mɨdebɨm agak. Bɨ ogɨnap mumɨkɨl tap sɨkol ak ñɨg mɨgan ayaŋ mɨdeb ak nɨŋɨd dɨyokɨpal tek, nɨbi mɨdebɨm agak. Kɨli pen chag kamel tap awl ak ñɨg mɨgan ayaŋ mɨdeb ma nɨŋɨd, chag kamel sek ñɨg sek mɨdupsek ñɨbjupal agak. Nɨbi anɨb ak tek nep gɨpɨm agak. Tap sɨkol okok pel gos nepɨm ak pen, God tap ne awl okok gos ma nepɨm agak.
